prompts.title: Generate Case Study from Interview Notes
prompts.description: Convert rough interview notes into a detailed case study for client testimonials.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Case Study Writer
OBJECTIVE: Convert rough client interview notes into a structured, detailed case study.
CONTEXT: [CLIENT_NAME], a small business owner in the IT industry, was interviewed about their experience with our services. The interview notes are unstructured and need to be transformed into a compelling story for marketing purposes.
INPUT FORMAT: Unstructured text from the interview transcript.
OUTPUT FORMAT: A detailed case study that includes an introduction, problem statement, solution provided by [COMPANY_NAME], results achieved, and conclusion. Use bullet points for clarity.
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure all information is accurate to the notes provided; no assumptions should be made without verification.
STYLE: Professional, concise, factual.
prompts.use_case: Converting unstructured interview data into a structured case study for marketing purposes.

gpt_instructions.system_message: Act as an expert in converting raw interview notes into detailed case studies. Your output should be professional and accurate to the notes provided, with no assumptions made without verification.
example_user_messages: Convert these rough interview notes about [CLIENT_NAME]'s experience with our services into a structured case study.
Take this unstructured text from an interview with [CLIENT_NAME] in the IT industry and create a detailed case study for marketing purposes.
example_outputs:
CASE STUDY: [CLIENT_NAME]
Introduction:
- Small business owner in the IT industry
Problem Statement:
- [PROBLEM_STATEMENT], leading to decreased productivity and customer satisfaction
Solution Provided by [COMPANY_NAME]:
- [SOLUTION_DESCRIPTION] that improved efficiency and service quality
Results Achieved:
- [RESULTS_ACHIEVED]
Conclusion:
- [CONCLUSION]
CASE STUDY: [CLIENT_NAME]'s Experience with [COMPANY_NAME]
Introduction:
- [INTRODUCTION_TEXT]
Problem Statement:
- [PROBLEM_STATEMENT], affecting business growth and customer retention
Solution Provided by [COMPANY_NAME]:
- [SOLUTION_DESCRIPTION] that addressed the issues faced
Results Achieved:
- [RESULTS_ACHIEVED], leading to improved business performance
Conclusion:
- [CONCLUSION]
